mapper.select: SELECT qrtz_job_details.JOB_NAME jobName, qrtz_job_details.JOB_GROUP jobGroup, qrtz_job_details.JOB_CLASS_NAME jobClassName, qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_NAME triggerName, qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP triggerGroup, qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_STATE triggerState, qrtz_triggers.START_TIME startTime, qrtz_triggers.END_TIME endTime, qrtz_triggers.DESCRIPTION description, qrtz_cron_triggers.CRON_EXPRESSION cronExpression, qrtz_cron_triggers.TIME_ZONE_ID timeZoneId FROM qrtz_job_details JOIN qrtz_triggers JOIN qrtz_cron_triggers ON qrtz_job_details.JOB_NAME = qrtz_triggers.JOB_NAME AND qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_NAME = qrtz_cron_triggers.TRIGGER_NAME AND qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP = qrtz_cron_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP
